sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
The valorous acts performed at Gaunt, by the brave bonny lasse Mary Ambre; who in revenge of her lovers death, did play her part most gallantly. To the tune of, The blind beggar,.
1 sheet ([1] p.) : ill (woodcuts).
Printed for William Gibertson [sic] in Giltspur-street., London : [between 1660-1665]
Date of publication suggested by Wing. Verse: "When Captain couragious, whom deeth coul'd not ..." In two parts, printed side by side. Imperfect: mutilated, affecting text. Reproduction of original in the British Library.
=======

Printed for William Gibertson [sic] in Giltspur-street., London : [between 1660-1665]
Date of publication suggested by Wing. Verse: "When Captain couragious, whom deeth coul'd not ..." In two parts, printed side by side. Imperfect: mutilated, affecting text. Reproduction of original in the British Library.

Giltspur-street.
